00007 namespace base { class String; }

00010 namespace core {
00011 class IntentFilterProxy;
00012 class PatternMatcher;
00013 
00022 class DemandFilter {
00023   public:
00024     class AuthorityEntry;
00025 
00026     enum {
00027         /* The filter setPriority(int32_t) value at which system high-priority
00028          * subscribers are placed; that is, subscribers that should execute before
00029          * application code. Applications should never use filters with this or
00030          * higher priorities.
00031          */
00032         SYSTEM_HIGH_PRIORITY = 1000,
00033 
00034         /* The filter setPriority(int32_t) value at which system low-priority
00035          * subscribers are placed; that is, subscribers that should execute after
00036          * application code. Applications should never use filters with this or
00037          * lower priorities.
00038          */
00039         SYSTEM_LOW_PRIORITY = -1000
00040     };
00041 
00045     DemandFilter();
00046

00061                  const gaia::base::String& dataType);

00067

00072

00283     bool hasDataScheme(const gaia::base::String& scheme) const;
00284 
00293     bool hasDataType(const gaia::base::String& type) const;
00294 
00295     /* Modify priority of this filter. The default priority is 0. Positive values
00296      * will be before the default, lower values will be after it. Applications
00297      * must use a value that is larger than SYSTEM_LOW_PRIORITY and smaller than
00298      * SYSTEM_HIGH_PRIORITY.
00299      *
00300      * @param priority The new priority value.
00301      */
00302     void setPriority(int32_t priority);
00303 
00304     /* Return the priority of this filter.
00305      *
00306      * @return The priority of the filter.
00307      */
00308     int32_t getPriority() const;
00309 
00311     explicit DemandFilter(const IntentFilterProxy& proxy);
00312     inline IntentFilterProxy* getProxy() const { return mpProxy; }
00315   private:
00316     IntentFilterProxy* mpProxy;
00317 
00318   public:
00319     class AuthorityEntry {
00320         friend class DemandFilter;
00321 
00322       public:
00326         AuthorityEntry(const gaia::base::String& host,
00327                        const gaia::base::String& port);
00328 
00332         AuthorityEntry(const AuthorityEntry& o);

00343

00348 
00352         int32_t getPort() const;
00353 
00354       private:
00355         class Data;
00356         Data* mpData;

00358     };
